featured.text: However, if we travel west we will be in advance of ourselves as far as our internal clock is concerned, and problems may arise.
The list-based convention, on the other hand, is based on the list of typhoon names compiled in advance by a committee, and is more widely used.
Over the past century, hard hats have advanced considerably, evolving from canvas and leather to aluminum, fiberglass, and, eventually, to thermoplastic.

definition.en_def: To move forward or make progress.
definition.example: She decided to advance her career by taking additional courses.
